definition: can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very
that's just the way it is/exactly!

sentences.english: It was not easy to work in the shed;in winter it was a veritable ice-box.
sentences.chinese: 在这木棚里工作可不轻松，冬天简直是个冰箱。

sentences.english: Can i just put a layer of base fertilizer and follow by last layer of sand only?
sentences.chinese: 可不可以直接先放底肥，最后放上底沙？

sentences.english: You don't just have to sit in the stands and gape at the exploits of others.
sentences.chinese: 你大可不必坐在看台上，目瞪口呆地盯着别人的战绩。

sentences.english: If you feel guilty about doing this, don’t be.
sentences.chinese: 如果你觉得这么做你会有内疚感，那就大可不必。

sentences.english: Could you cut a little more off at the temples?
sentences.chinese: 你可不可以在两鬓处再剪掉一点？

sentences.english: what do they have to be unhappy about?
sentences.chinese: 他们有什么可不快乐的？

sentences.english: I am enough of a german to give them to go-by .
sentences.chinese: 我是德国人，我可不愿理睬他们。

sentences.english: Is it possible to bring about a complete revolution in the psyche?
sentences.chinese: 可不可能产生一个精神上的彻底革命？

sentences.english: Remember, they have a choice; they can listen or not listen.
sentences.chinese: 记住，选择权在孩子，他们可听可不听。

sentences.english: Not like the foul-mouthed bunch today.
sentences.chinese: 可不像现在那些满口脏话的年轻人。

sentences.english: It's not a food of mass consumption, like noodles or rice.
sentences.chinese: 这可不像面条或大米一样，是大众能消费的食物。

sentences.english: "Oh, no, " she said breathlessly. "No, I wouldn't like fights.
sentences.chinese: “不，”她缓和地说，“我可不爱好拳击赛。

sentences.english: The first, the one you should not meet, so then you may not love .
sentences.chinese: 仓央嘉措第一最好不相见，如此便可不相恋。

sentences.english: And would you ask if the rent is still negotiable or not?
sentences.chinese: 还有，可不可以问问租金是否仍有商量余地呢？

sentences.english: Lifted an eye to sweep 2 people's one eye in June, again pendency, can be not strange?
sentences.chinese: 六月抬眼扫了两人一眼，又垂下，可不奇么？

definition: that's just the way it is/exactly!
by no means/definitely not/as if!/yeah right!
(coll.) As a matter of fact, ... (used to introduce evidence for what one has just asserted)
in no way/not in the least/absolutely not
youngest/most junior/tiny/one (unambiguous spoken form when spelling out numbers, esp. on telephone or in military)/one or ace on dice or dominoes/variant of 吆[yao1], to shout
returning to our main topic,.../that said,.../again,.../in this connection/in passing/nevertheless,.../anyhow
to leave/to depart/to separate/to distinguish/to classify/other/another/don't ...!/to pin/to stick (sth) in
to make sb change their ways, opinions etc
to say again/to put off a discussion until later/moreover/what's more/besides
